alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 10:59AM CST until January 29 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Rockport affecting Copiah and Simpson Counties. Pearl River Near Monticello affecting Lawrence County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River near Monticello. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Water inundates some lowland and agricultural land near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CST Thursday the stage was 20.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 23.0 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - - && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Pearl River Monticello 22.0 20.9 Thu 10 am CS 23.0 22.7 22.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 1100 PM CST.
